name: Junior/Middle Data Scientist (Machine Learning engineer) remotely
description:
Our company use lean and distributed machine learning to predict,
detect and resolve critical failures in your applications run on Kubernetes clusters.
We are seeking for junior or middle data scientist/machine learning engineer for full time remote work.

Requirements:
- Experience 1+ year in Deep Learning and Artificial Neural Networks, such as classifiers/regressors/predictors,CNN, RNN, GANs, RL, computer vision solutions, and related domains.
- Experience 1+ year Software Engineering with a strong focus on Artificial Intelligence algorithms and methods with one of the languages like:Python, C++, Java, and R.
- English - C1 or higher.

Advantage for whose who have experience with:
- Unsupervised/supervised clustering models such as PCA, SVM, TSNE.
- AI development for the following application domains: Natural Language Processing (NLP) Applications and optimized policies using RL.
- Model training and validation, testing using the following platforms: TensorFlow, Keras, or Pytorch.
- Hyperparameter fine-tuning process.
- Deep learning networks (very deep nets) regularization techniques such as L1/L2, dropout, data augmentation, and early stopping.
- Deep understanding on over-fitting, underfitting issues, and in particular with Bias – Variance tradeoff. Refine training sets.
- Strong technical writing and presentation.
- Run and test models on different platforms: Microsoft Windows, Linux, or macOS.
- Data analysis, data normalization, and data filling/padding.
- Bachelor or Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or Applied Math.

Our benefits:
- Modern technologies and interesting project.
- International team with extensive experience.
- Creative atmosphere. We welcome your ideas and suggestions.
- Flexible work schedule.
- 8 hour working day.
- Remote work
